title: The Push to Stop Mandatory Vaccinations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/21/17
itunes:title: The Push to Stop Mandatory Vaccinations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/21/17
description:
George Noory and guest Jonathon Emord discuss his efforts to stop mandatory vaccinations of children and how the government is taking away freedom from parents.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
